channel.title: Posts on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chris Turner

item.title: Python
item.description: Intro to Python Python can be used as a calculator. 3-2 ## 1 3.0/2 ## 1.5 Indexing on Python begins at 0th position. list1=[2,4,10,6,7,8,9,3] You can analyze and change the list in multiple ways. list1[3] ## 6 list1.append(9) list1 ## [2, 4, 10, 6, 7, 8, 9, 3, 9] list1[3] ## 6 Importing Numpy allows access to different functions and use different arrays on Python. import numpy as np x=np.

item.title: Python
item.description: Intro to Python Python can be used as a calculator. 3-2 ## 1 3.0/2 ## 1.5 Indexing on Python begins at 0th position. list1=[2,4,10,6,7,8,9,3] You can analyze and change the list in multiple ways. list1[3] ## 6 list1.append(9) list1 ## [2, 4, 10, 6, 7, 8, 9, 3, 9] list1[3] ## 6 Importing Numpy allows access to different functions and use different arrays on Python. import numpy as np x=np.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
